name: European Fruit Juice Association
goal:
The main objectives of the AIJN are:
• To represent the interests of its members among the EU authorities and institutions.
• To develop any initiative with a view to promoting its industries.
• To constitute a forum for the development of greater cooperation and solidarity among its members.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Consumer Affairs, Food Safety, Internal Market, Public Health, Trade
euInitiatives:
Directive 2001/112/EU - fruit juice
Regulation 1333/2008 - food additives
Regulation 396/2005 - pesticides
Regulation 1924/2006 - nutrition and health claims
Regulation 1169/2011 - provision of food information
